name: Gaze Of The Eyeless
description:
At the bottom of the underground sits a dying town with only an orphan boy left in it. Follow the traces of your missing family and ascend maze-like caverns. Find riches, weapons, foes and friends.

Gaze of the Eyeless is a Lovecraft inspired 2D side scrolling Action Adventure exploring a mysterious underground world and unlocking the secrets at its peak.





Game Features:

  • Classic side-scrolling action.

  • Play with precision and full control

  • Dodging, dashing, slashing, and shooting.

  • Use a variety of weapons to shoot and slash your enemies

  • Manage your items and ammo to survive

  • Upgrade your weapons! Gain new skills, abilities and weapons. Acquire melee, ranged, magic, and other skills

  • Complete Quests to get rewards

  • Explore the world as you like, there is no set path

  • Beautiful painted landscapes

  • Determine how the story ends through your actions
